name: Anomalous Deception
storyline:
Taking place in an alternate late 1960s decades after WWII ended, the world seems even grimmer in fear of a nuclear war. The soviet union is the number one thriving superpower and is a force to be reckoned with.

You've been jammed shut-in the only communication you get is a radio that is a one-way conversation. You are equipped with a hazmat suit, a gas mask, a flashlight, and a backpack you are forbidden to open. Your mission is to infiltrate the hallway what lies ahead is a mystery, what will you discover in this abandoned bunker?

A hallway that is randomly generated for each playthrough, so it won't be the same the next time you play! Each event will play differently as you descend through the hallways of never-ending torment. Interact with the environment by scanning through the level and finding something interesting! Do not let it win; you must survive whatever lurks in there and learn its environment, skills, behavior, and more! Whatever you do, don't look back!
summary: A PSX-retro-style first-person survival horror game that takes place in a underground bunker that is randomly generated for each playthrough! Discover its secrets and mysteries of what led you down there in the first place.
